The image was published on a Facebook po: 2019, and has been shared more than 3,600 times.
The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image translates to English as: "A sea of about 400,000 people gathered at the Anuradhapura Salgadu Stadium for Mr. Gotabaya’s inaugural rally. Toiyyas are ruined. Victory is certain!"
The same image was shared on other Faceb: 4. A reverse image search on Yandex found that the photo was originally published by UK-based photo agency Alamy on July 15, 2018, showing crowds in Paris celebrating France's victory in the 2018 FIFA World Cup.
